doc.previous: As of 2012 bestiality is illegal in 37 U S states Most state bestiality laws were enacted between 1999 and 2012 74 Until 2005 there was a farm near Enumclaw Washington that was described as an animal brothel where people paid to have sex with animals After an incident on 2 July 2005 when a man was pronounced dead in the emergency room of the Enumclaw community hospital after his colon ruptured due to having been sodomized by a horse the farm garnered police attention The state legislature of the State of Washington which had been one of the few states in the United States without a law against bestiality within six months passed a bill making bestiality illegal 75 76 Arizona 77 Alaska 78 and Florida now ban bestiality 79 When such laws are proposed they are never questioned or debated 80 81 Laws which prohibit non abusive bestiality have been criticized for being discriminatory unjust and unconstitutional 82 83
doc.after: Pornography involving sex with animals is widely illegal even in most countries where bestiality itself is not explicitly outlawed citation needed
